scripts.cy:open: concurrently -k "npm run server" "wait-on http://localhost:8086/ && npm run test"
scripts.cy:run: concurrently -k "npm run server" "wait-on http://localhost:8086/ && npx cypress run"
scripts.cy:name: cypress run --env grep='Test case 1: Register user' --spec 'cypress/e2e/autotests.cy.js'
